title: Scaring people to observe fear study

content.question: A researcher goes to a local public park and jumps out from behind a tree to scare people as they walk by. The researcher says she is investigating the expression of fear in natural environments. Which of the following describes an ethical issue with this research approach?

choices.label: The researcher did not randomly assign the participants.
The researcher did not get informed consent.
The researcher did not operationally define the dependent variable.
The researcher should have used a confederate.

content.answer: The researcher did not get informed consent.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
